forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Thunder possible. High 17C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. High 63F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Thunder possible. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Thunder possible. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 16C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 62F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 18C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High near 65F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 63F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 59F. ENE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low near 50F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.
